Class oracle.html.TableRowCell 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----oracle.html.Item
           |
           +----oracle.html.TableCell
                   |
                   +----oracle.html.TableRowCell
public class TableRowCell
extends TableCell
Description:

TableRowCell encapsulates a TR element

Instructions:

This class is normally wrapped in TableRow and automatically instantiated when you need it.

Example:

You don't normally instantiate a TableRowCell. Although you can do it: 

// Instantiate a TableRowCell object
TableRowCell cell = new TableRowCell();

See Also:
TableCell, TableRow

TableRowCell(int, int)
Creates a TableRowCell object with specified Horizontal Alignment and Vertical Alignment Attributes
TableRowCell()
Creates a TableRowCell object with default attributes

print()
Print the content of object as HTML string to System.out
startTag()
Returns start Tag for this TableRowCell
toHTML()
Returns content of object as HTML string
Implementation Note: Objct should be both browser-independent and browser-aware
toString()
Returns content as regular string In case of TableRowCell, there is no need to return anything

  public TableRowCell(int halign,
